translation.en: [young man] I didn't really have your typical upbringing.
I mean, I did at first, but then the world ended.
translation.de: Also, anfangs schon, aber dann ging die Welt unter.

translation.en: I don't think anyone was really shocked.
We always thought it might, and then it just finally happened.
translation.de: Wir haben immer damit gerechnet, und dann ist es passiert.

translation.en: But how it happened, now that's where it gets interesting.
translation.de: Aber wie es passiert ist, ist doch interessant.

translation.en: Yep, an asteroid heading straight for Earth.
translation.de: Ja, ein Asteroid auf dem Weg zur Erde.

translation.en: I know. So obvious.
So, humanity came together, and we did what we do best.
translation.de: Die Menschheit tat, was wir am besten können.

translation.en: We shot a bunch of rockets at it! And we blew it up! And it was great!
translation.de: Wir jagten das Ding mit Raketen hoch! Toll!

translation.en: But it wasn't. You see, the thing that makes rockets rockets--
translation.de: Leider nicht. Was Raketen zu Raketen macht,

translation.en: chemical compounds, a lot of 'em.
Which rained back down on us, and everything changed.
translation.de: Die regnete herab und änderte alles.

translation.en: And by "everything," I mean cold-blooded creatures.
And by "changed," I mean mutated and started eating us to death.
translation.de: Und mit "verändert" meine ich mutiert zu Menschenfressern.

translation.en: Ants, lizards, roaches, crocodiles. You name it. There's a lot of 'em.
translation.de: Ameisen, Echsen, Kakerlaken, Krokodile… Es gibt jede Menge.

translation.en: I knew this one kid who was eaten in his sleep by a goldfish he won at a carnival.
translation.de: Ein Junge wurde im Schlaf von seinem Goldfisch gefressen.

translation.en: -[growls] -Man, Todd loved that goldfish.
translation.de: Ein Junge wurde im Schlaf von seinem Goldfisch gefressen. Todd liebte diesen Goldfisch.

translation.en: And that cat.
So, for most of human history, if you wanted to kill a cockroach,
translation.de: Wollte man früher eine Kakerlake töten,

translation.en: all you needed was a shoe.
Well, suddenly you needed a shotgun.
And sometimes even a tank.
And sometimes even that doesn't work.
translation.de: Und der reicht auch nicht immer.

translation.en: Especially if you don't stay in the tank, Bob.
translation.de: Vor allem, wenn man nicht im Panzer bleibt, Bob.

translation.en: Eventually, the really big ones and our military took each other out.
translation.de: Die Großen und das Militär löschten einander aus.

translation.en: We lost 95% of the human population in about a year.
translation.de: Wir verloren 95% der Bevölkerung in einem Jahr.

translation.en: That's a lot of Bobs.
And a lot of Todds.
Those of us who survived, we hid anywhere we could--
translation.de: Wir Überlebenden versteckten uns, wo wir nur konnten.

translation.en: bunkers, caves, panic rooms, all around the world.
translation.de: Bunker, Höhlen, Panikräume, überall auf der Welt.

translation.en: So for the last seven years I've been living in an underground bunker.
translation.de: Seit sieben Jahren lebe ich in einem unterirdischen Bunker.

translation.en: It's not-- It's not as bad as it sounds. Really.
translation.de: Es ist nicht so schlimm, wie es klingt.

translation.en: It's a great group of people, and we all love each other.
translation.de: Es ist eine tolle Gruppe, und wir haben uns lieb.

translation.en: It's kinda what I imagined college would have been like.
translation.de: So hätte ich mir das College vorgestellt.

translation.en: -[panting] -[woman] Are you sure he's asleep?
[man] Who?
-[woman] Joel. Who else? -[man] Yeah. He's asleep.
-[woman] Hang on. Shh. -[man] He's not awake.
-[woman] Are you sure? -It's just you.
[woman] I just-- I don't…
[man] Joel. Joel.
[whispering] See? He's not awake.
translation.de: Siehst du? Er ist nicht wach.

translation.en: -It's just you. -[woman sighs]
[Joel] Dear Aimee, I am wide awake.
I've just gotten good at not really moving or breathing.
translation.de: Ich habe nur gelernt, mich nicht zu bewegen oder zu atmen.

translation.en: Being stuck in a survival bunker
with a bunch of people who have all found their soul mate is less than ideal.
translation.de: mit Leuten, die alle ihren Partner gefunden haben, ist nicht ideal.

translation.en: Karen and Ray got together a few months ago,
translation.de: Karen und Ray sind seit kurzem zusammen,

translation.en: so they're still kinda in their honeymoon phase.
-[Karen, Ray continue moaning] -It is super physical.
Good for them, you know. They're both very attractive and apparently quite flexible.
translation.de: Schön für sie. Sie sind attraktiv und anscheinend sehr gelenkig.

translation.en: Hey, life's short. Especially down here.
translation.de: Hey, das Leben ist kurz. Besonders hier unten.

translation.en: -Oh. Hey, Ava. -[Ava] Hey, Joel.
-[man] Joel. How's it going? -It's going good, Tim.
-How are you-- How are you doing? -[Tim] Yeah, good.
[Joel] Cool.
-I couldn't sleep. -[Ava] Yeah, we know the feeling.
Yeah. Probably not for the same reasons.
translation.de: Ja. Wahrscheinlich nicht aus demselben Grund.

translation.en: You guys's, uh, door's open. Is that-- Did you know that?
translation.de: Eure Tür steht offen. Ist das… Wusstet ihr das?

translation.en: -[Ava] Yeah. -[Tim] Yeah, we know.
Okay.
[Joel] After Tim's parents were eaten by termites,
he and Ava became inseparable.
Okay. Good night.
-In every way. -[both] Night.
That's the asteroid they named 616 Agatha.
translation.de: Das ist der Asteroid mit Namen 616 Agatha.

translation.en: And these are all the chemical bombs they sent up to try and…
translation.de: Und das sind Chemiebomben, die sie hochschickten…

translation.en: [Joel] So, pretty much everyone's coupled up down here.
translation.de: Hier unten sind so ziemlich alle verbandelt.

translation.en: Our first baby was born last winter. It was super emotional.
translation.de: Unser erstes Baby kam im Winter zur Welt. Sehr bewegend.

translation.en: Welcome to the apocalypse, kid.
The food sucks. At least you'll never know what you're missing.
translation.de: Das Essen ist mies. Aber weißt du ja nicht.

translation.en: Kala and Connor got together after Carol died.
translation.de: Kala and Connor kamen zusammen, nachdem Carol starb.

translation.en: Carol was a cow who ate a box of laundry detergent.
translation.de: Carol war eine Kuh. Sie fraß ein Paket Waschpulver.

translation.en: -And now we only have one cow. -[cow mooing]
translation.de: Und jetzt haben wir nur eine Kuh.

translation.en: Her name's Gertie.
Gertie is great.
Gertie's not our only food source.
translation.de: Wir haben noch mehr zu essen.

translation.en: We have a hunting party that brings back whatever they can from the surface.
translation.de: Unsere Jäger bringen alles mögliche von oben mit.

translation.en: It was easier in the beginning, you know, before we ran out of bullets.
translation.de: Anfangs war es leichter, bevor uns die Kugeln ausgingen.

translation.en: Facing down one of those things with a janky handmade weapon
translation.de: Sich so einem Ding mit selbstgebauten Waffen zu stellen,

translation.en: is no walk in the park.
Or so they tell me. I-I don't go on the hunting parties.
translation.de: Sagt man mir jedenfalls. Ich gehe nicht mit auf die Jagd.

translation.en: They need me in the kitchen. I'm kinda the… -[chopping] -…the chef of the bunker.
translation.de: Ich werde in der Küche gebraucht. Ich bin der Koch des Bunkers.

translation.en: Everyone likes my minestrone.
Being the only single person in the bunker has its perks too.
translation.de: Der einzige Single zu sein, hat auch Vorteile.

translation.en: I get to hang out with Mavis.
Of course, she's not much for conversation anymore.
translation.de: Große Gespräche sind natürlich nicht mehr drin.

translation.en: Her core battery's shot, just like every other Mavis, I'd imagine.
translation.de: Ihre Batterie ist hin, wie wohl bei jeder anderen Mav1s.

translation.en: Actually never seen a working one.
[Joel] Sure wish you were here, Aimee.
I'd love for you to meet everyone.
[Joel] Oh, yeah.
Maybe we could do a little target practice together.
It's kinda my thing.
Well…
-Sorry, Mavis. -[Gertie moos]
[Connor] Hustle, hustle, people. We gotta move.
[grunting] Guys!
Guys! I got the weapons.
-Stay. -What?
-Get what you need, and let's go. -What's happening? What's going on?
translation.de: -Nehmt, was ihr braucht, und dann los. -Was ist los?

translation.en: -[Connor] We're breached. -Breached?
-Joel. -What do you mean?
-Like inside-the-bunker breached? -That's what "breached" means, kiddo.
[whispers] Breached.
Anna Lucia and I will engage. Anderson and Tim, flank us.
translation.de: Anna und ich vorne. Anderson und Tim, Flanke.

translation.en: Flank 'em, yeah, okay. Where do you guys need me? The rear, or--
translation.de: Flanke, ok. Wo wollt ihr mich? Hinten oder…

translation.en: -I thought we were past this, Joel. -Past what? You need help. I can help.
translation.de: -Das hatten wir, Joel. -Was? Ich kann helfen.

translation.en: -Let me help. -You gonna make me say it?
-Say what? -You can't handle it, Joel.
-You're shook. -Okay, yeah.
-So, you guys don't get scared ever? -[Connor] We get scared.
translation.de: -Habt ihr denn nie Angst? -Wir haben Angst.

translation.en: [Tim] We all get scared, Joel, but you get really scared.
translation.de: Wir alle. Aber du hast richtig Angst.

translation.en: -We're not trying to make you feel bad. -We love you, Joel.
translation.de: -Wir meinen es nicht böse. -Wir haben dich lieb.

translation.en: [Connor] But you're unsafe.
-[Tim] You're a liability. -Even on supply runs.
Okay, why did that speech feel so rehearsed?
-Connor. -[device beeps]
Okay, 30 meters out. Let's move.
translation.de: Ok, 30 Meter weit weg. Gehen wir.

translation.en: -Be careful, Connor-Bear. -I will, Kala-Bee.
[Connor] Load out.
Go with them.
[Karen] They're getting close.
-[gasps] -[Ava] Shit.
[Karen whispers] Oh, my God.
-[Anderson] It got one of 'em. -[Karen] What about the others?
translation.de: -Es hat einen. -Was ist mit den anderen?

translation.en: They're coming back.
They need help. I'm going.
[Kala] Joel! Wait!
-[whispering] Connor? -[faint groan]
Did I shoot it, or did you?
translation.de: Habe ich es erschossen oder du?

translation.en: What do you think?
You.
[Joel] Oh, and I have a pretty severe freezing problem.
But I am working on it.
-[woman whispers] How is it looking? -I think it looks really good.
translation.de: -Wie sieht es aus? -Sieht echt gut aus.

translation.en: -Does it look like me? -Yeah.
Are you sure that this pose looks natural?
translation.de: Bist du sicher, dass das natürlich wirkt?

translation.en: -Yeah. -Yeah?
I think it's really good.
What are you doing? Don't move.
-Will you let me see it? -Don't-- Don't move. Aimee.
-I really wanna see it. -[growls]
[laughs] Can I see it?
Okay.
Okay.
-Ready? -Mm-hmm.
[Joel] What do you think?
Why do I have a beard? [snickers]
No, that's shading. I did the shading.
My head is-- is so large.
-You have a big head. -And my hand is so tiny.
translation.de: -Du hast einen großen Kopf. -Und meine Hand ist winzig.

translation.en: You have tiny hands.
I love it. I frickin' love it.
-That's super sweet, 'cause it's terrible. -[Aimee laughs]
translation.de: Das ist echt süß, weil es schrecklich ist.

translation.en: -I got you something too. -What?
I don't know if these are the right ones.
translation.de: Ich weiß nicht, ob das die Richtigen sind.

translation.en: No way. These are the ones that I-I-I wanted to get.
translation.de: Gibt's ja nicht. Das sind genau die, die ich wollte.

translation.en: -Really? -Yeah.
-What's happening right now? -Uh--
-Are you okay? -Yeah, I'm dancing with my shoulders.
translation.de: -Alles ok? -Ja, ich tanze mit meinen Schultern.

translation.en: -Oh, yeah. -Oh, yeah.
This has been the best summer of my life.
Mine too.
What are you doing?
-Do you know what time it is? -Uh, I think it's, like, 6:30.
translation.de: -Weißt du, wie spät es ist? -Ich glaube, es ist halb sieben.

translation.en: Aimee, you're-- you're scaring Crocodile Carl.
translation.de: Aimee, du erschreckst Karl das Krokodil.

translation.en: Okay, look away, Crocodile Carl.
Oh. Look away. Hey, I get it.
-[Aimee giggles] -I get it.
We need to go.
I'm scared.
[Joel] Dear Aimee, This week has been especially shitty.
translation.de: Liebe Aimee, diese Woche war besonders beschissen.

translation.en: We lost Connor to what looked like a really big ant.
translation.de: Wir haben Connor an eine große Ameise verloren.

translation.en: Helps me to draw them.
I try to capture their essence,
scribble down some notes on how to kill them.
translation.de: und notiere, wie man sie töten kann.

translation.en: Sometimes I think it's the only way I know how to cope with these things.
translation.de: Manchmal denke ich, nur so komme ich klar.

translation.en: -[switch clicks] -This is 7045. Come in, 3022.
-I repeat, come in, 3022. Over. -[switch clicks]
[woman] This is 3022. What is it now, Ray?
translation.de: Hier ist 3022. Was ist los, Ray?

translation.en: Hey, Janice. No, it's actually-- It's, uh, Joel.
translation.de: Hey, Janice. Nein, hier… Ich bin es, Joel.

translation.en: -[chuckles] Oh. Joel. -Yeah.
All right. Hold on one second.
Aimee, it's Ray!
It's Joel. Thanks, Janice.
-[Aimee] Joel! Hey! -Hey, Aimee! Hi!
-How are you? -Hi. Yeah, I, uh-- I'm good.
translation.de: -Wie geht es dir? -Hi. Mir geht's gut.

translation.en: -It's so good to hear your voice. -I'm so sorry.
translation.de: -Schön, deine Stimme zu hören. -Es tut mir so leid.

translation.en: I heard on the open frequency that one of you guys got killed.
translation.de: Auf der offenen Frequenz hieß es, jemand wurde getötet.

translation.en: Yeah. Breached the bunker.
translation.de: Ja. Sie drangen in den Bunker ein.

translation.en: Wow. Actually got inside?
Yeah. It's the first time it's happened. It was kinda scary.
translation.de: Ja. So was ist zum ersten Mal passiert. Es war beängstigend.

translation.en: Did you have to fight it too?
Yeah. Yeah, a little. I had to fight it a little bit.
translation.de: Ja, ein bisschen. Ich musste ein bisschen dagegen kämpfen.

translation.en: Actually got super ripped since the last time you saw me, so--
translation.de: Ich bin seit früher echt kernig geworden.

translation.en: Oh. Wow! [giggles] Super ripped, huh?
Yeah, I was kidding. I'm not super ripped. That was just a bad joke.
translation.de: Ein Scherz. Ich bin nicht kernig. Das war ein schlechter Witz.

translation.en: Well, I'm glad you're okay.
translation.de: Schön, dass es dir gut geht.

translation.en: Thanks. Yeah.
I am still kinda blown away that you were even able to find my colony on this thing.
translation.de: Unglaublich, dass du uns auf diesem Ding gefunden hast.

translation.en: I know. It's pretty crazy.
'Cause I found it on the first one. What are the odds?
translation.de: Und gleich beim ersten Versuch. Was für ein Zufall.

translation.en: -[both chuckle] -[Aimee] Crazy.
Yeah. No, I-I called-- I called, like, 90.
translation.de: Ja. Nein, ich habe an die 90 angefunkt.

translation.en: Hey, you know what I, uh-- know what I wish sometimes?
translation.de: Hey, weißt du, was ich mir manchmal wünsche?

translation.en: What?
That I could, like, s-snap my fingers and be back in that car with you.
translation.de: Dass ich mit den Fingern schnipse und wieder mit dir im Auto wäre.

translation.en: Man, that'd be nice.
Yeah. Too bad it's, uh…
you know, impossible.
Kinda feels like everything is impossible these days.
translation.de: Es fühlt sich an, als wäre alles unmöglich.

translation.en: Taking care of this whole colony is exhausting.
translation.de: Sich um diese Kolonie zu kümmern, ist anstrengend.

translation.en: I, uh-- I-I write you letters.
Really?
Yeah. Yeah, I-I write you letters sometimes.
translation.de: Ja, ich schreibe dir manchmal Briefe.

translation.en: -Aw! -All the time.
I'd love to read 'em.
-Really? I would love to read them to-- -[static surges, stops]
translation.de: Wirklich? Ich würde sie dir gerne…

translation.en: -No. Aimee? -[switches clicking]
-Aimee? -[static buzzing]
[Joel] We've lost a lot of people over the years.
You'd think you'd get numb to it after a certain point.
translation.de: Man sollte meinen, man gewöhnt sich daran.

translation.en: You don't.
-I'm sorry. -Thank God! Where have you been, Joel?
translation.de: -Tut mir leid. -Gott sei Dank! Wo warst du, Joel?

translation.en: We have to go right now. Say your goodbyes, get in the car.
translation.de: Wir müssen sofort los. Sag tschüss, steig ein.

translation.en: -I should go. -Maybe you should come with us.
-No, my mom is waiting. I'm sorry. -[creature roaring]
translation.de: Meine Mom wartet. Tut mir leid.

translation.en: Get in the car! Aimee, you need to hurry home now!
translation.de: Einsteigen! Aimee, du musst nach Hause!

translation.en: -I want you to have this. -What? This is Crocodile Carl.
translation.de: -Das ist für dich. -Was? Karl das Krokodil.

translation.en: It's your good luck charm.
-Be careful. -You too.
I love you.
I love you too.
I'm gonna come find you.
You better.
[Aimee's voice] You better.
[Anna Lucia] I wanna know how it got in.
translation.de: Ich will wissen, wie es reinkam.

translation.en: [Ray] It appears to have ripped through one of our perimeter defenses.
translation.de: Es muss durch eine Schutzwand gekommen sein.

translation.en: [Ava] It ripped through steel?
[Tim] Anderson and I resealed the breach point and vent.
translation.de: Anderson und ich haben alles versiegelt.

translation.en: -Nothing's getting in that way again. -But why did it happen?
translation.de: -Da kommt nichts durch. -Aber wie kam es dazu?

translation.en: It was a freak occurrence. There's no reason to think it'll happen again.
translation.de: Es war eine Ausnahme. Es passiert nicht wieder.

translation.en: -[Ray] We should try to stay calm. -[all arguing]
-How far away is Aimee's colony? -[arguing stops]
-What? -Aimee's colony.
-How far away is it? -About 85 miles.
-How long does that take to get there? -You're not actually thinking of going?
translation.de: -Wie lange braucht man dahin? -Meinst du das im Ernst?

translation.en: Tim, just… humor me.
-How long? -Seven days.
Minimum.
An armed and trained hunting party would be lucky to last 50 miles on the surface.
translation.de: Eine bewaffnete und trainierte Truppe kommt keine 100 km weit.

translation.en: But you, Joel…
All right, now I need volunteers
to help reinforce some of the outer perimeter.
-[Anna Lucia] Yeah, I'm gonna go. -[all chattering]
-Ava's got this. -[Karen] Exactly.
I'm gonna go.
It's an impossible journey, Joel.
translation.de: Es ist eine unmögliche Reise, Joel.

translation.en: No, I'm serious.
I love you guys, but there's one person in this world
translation.de: Ich habe euch lieb, aber… Es gibt eine Person, die mich je glücklich gemacht hat,

translation.en: who ever truly made me happy,
translation.de: Es gibt eine Person, die mich je glücklich gemacht hat,

translation.en: and she's only 85 miles away.
translation.de: und sie ist nur 150 km entfernt.

translation.en: And I'm gonna go see her.
That felt awesome.
[Joel] Dear Aimee, I am done hiding.
translation.de: Liebe Aimee, ich verstecke mich nicht länger.

translation.en: I'm done waiting for things to get better.
It's time to take matters into my own hands.
translation.de: Ich nehme es jetzt in die Hand.

translation.en: Time to let someone else make the minestrone.
I'm taking a radio, even though it doesn't have power.
translation.de: Ich nehme ein Radio mit, das keinen Strom hat.

translation.en: But I'm gonna take it anyway.
-Wish me luck, Gertie. -[Gertie moos]
Mavis, take care of her.
You're not joking, are you?
Nope. Nope, I'm not.
He's not joking.
We're not letting you leave, Joel. You're needed here.
translation.de: Wir lassen dich nicht gehen. Du wirst gebraucht.

translation.en: Tim, no, I'm not. Come on. I don't do anything.
translation.de: Nein, werde ich nicht. Komm schon. Ich tue nichts.

translation.en: Joel, that's not true. You fix the radio. You make the minestrone.
translation.de: Das stimmt nicht. Du reparierst das Radio. Du machst Minestrone.

translation.en: [exhales] Okay. Doesn't sound as important when I say it out loud.
translation.de: Okay. Es klingt nicht so wichtig, wenn ich es sage.

translation.en: I appreciate you trying. Really, I do.
I just don't feel like I belong anywhere.
I don't really wanna die all alone at the end of the world, so…
translation.de: Ich will nicht alleine beim Weltuntergang sterben.

translation.en: Look, I know you guys all just think of me as, like, some little, pathetic,
translation.de: Ich weiß, ihr haltet mich alle für einen kleinen, bemitleidenswerten,

translation.en: adorable hedgehog.
But I can take care of myself.
I'm actually probably a lot stronger than you might think.
translation.de: Ich bin sicher stärker, als ihr denkt.

translation.en: -We made you a map. -Thanks, Karen.
Just… take care.
Everything will try to kill you.
Be observant. Use the advantages that you have.
-You're fast and small, so… -Right.
-Don't fight. -Don't fight.
Just run and hide.
Thanks, Ray.
You're an asshole if you get eaten.
-Okay. -Nice.
I love you guys. Tell Aimee I'll see her in seven days.
translation.de: Ich hab euch lieb. Sagt Aimee, nur sieben Tage.

translation.en: -[Anderson] We believe in you. -[Tim] Love you, buddy.
Where am I?
Well, it's not super useful.
Okay, well, you know what? We know we gotta head west. Right?
translation.de: Okay, wisst ihr was? Wir wissen, wir müssen nach Westen. Oder?

translation.en: So, let's just… do that.
Start with something easy. West.
Nope, it's this way. West is this way.
translation.de: Nein, da lang. Westen ist da lang.

translation.en: Shit.
Split the difference. Go this way.
translation.de: Treffen wir uns in der Mitte. Da lang.

translation.en: Done. First decision made.
[Joel] Dear Aimee, I am doing it.
I'm really doing it!
Honestly, I thought it'd be way worse. So far, it's not too bad.
translation.de: Ich habe es mir schlimmer vorgestellt. Bis jetzt geht es.

translation.en: I've seen a lot of signs of death, but no actual death.
translation.de: Ich sehe viele Anzeichen von Tod, aber keinen Tod an sich.

translation.en: So, cross your fingers.
Monster eggs.
Trying to stay positive.
Weather's nice. Getting some fresh air. What else can I tell ya?
translation.de: Schönes Wetter. Frische Luft schnappen. Was soll ich sagen?

translation.en: -Wham-O-- -[creatures chirping]
-[wings fluttering] -No.
-[branches snapping] -Run and hide.
Hide in the house. Hide in the house.
No.
No, no, no. No!
-[barking continues] -[grunts] No! No, no, no! [screaming]
-[growling] -Yes! Bite it! Bite it off!
Wait. Wait, wait, wait, wait, wait!
Where are you going?
Whoa, that was so cool.
Nice place.
-Can I sit? -[whines]
Thanks.
You all alone?
-[whines] -Yeah. Me too.
-Boy? -[grunts]
Is that your name? Boy? Your name is Boy.
translation.de: Ist das dein Name? Boy? Dein Name ist Boy.

translation.en: I'm Joel.
Nice to meet ya.
Thanks, uh… Thanks for saving my life, Boy.
translation.de: Danke, dass du mir das Leben gerettet hast, Boy.

translation.en: -[growls, whines] -Is this a dress?
Oh. Oh. Oh. Oh. Sorry.
Okay, I won't touch it again.
translation.de: Ich fasse es nicht wieder an.

translation.en: Was that your owner's?
It's okay. You don't have to talk about it.
Sorry.
Wait. Did you think I was her?
I'm gonna lie down too. Is that o--
translation.de: Ich lege mich auch hin. Ist das…?

translation.en: No, it's okay. Just my backpack.
translation.de: Nein, schon gut. Nur mein Rucksack.

translation.en: You know, I had a girl, too, once.
translation.de: Ich hatte auch mal ein Mädchen.

translation.en: Think you would've really liked her. You guys would totally get along.
translation.de: Du hättest sie gemocht. Ihr hättet euch verstanden.

translation.en: She loves dogs. I mean, all animals. She's a big animal lover.
translation.de: Sie liebt Hunde. Alle Tiere. Sie ist ein großer Tierfreund.

translation.en: I haven't seen her in seven years.
Long time. That's why I'm trying to go find her.

translation.de: Wir stoßen an und begrüßen dich in der Kolonie.

translation.en: Okay.
First beer's on me.
Thanks.
He's nice.
Brews his own beer.
-[Joel] Oh. -Hello, darling. How are you?
Course he does.
I'm sorry. There's just so much going on right now.
translation.de: Tut mir leid. Es ist gerade viel los.

translation.en: -Do you mind? -Yeah.
It's crazy.
Pretty nice here, you know.
Why, uh… why do you have to leave?
-It's beautiful. It's just not safe. -Right.
Everyone's afraid.
Even your bunker got breached and you're all young and strong.
translation.de: Sogar euer Bunker wurde geknackt, und ihr seid jung.

translation.en: Yeah.
Sorry. I know you got, like, a lot going on, but, uh…
translation.de: Ich weiß, du hast viel um die Ohren, aber…

translation.en: you know, I came-- I came all the way here to see you,
translation.de: …weißt du, ich bin hergekommen, um dich zu sehen,

translation.en: and so I'm just…
checkin' in.
Just wondering how you're… feeling about that.
translation.de: Ich frage mich, wie du das findest.

translation.en: I think it's the most romantic thing anyone's ever done.
You do? Okay. Okay, good, 'cause, um--
But listen, Joel, um…
talking to you on the radio was such a nice escape
translation.de: Über Funk mit dir zu reden war eine schöne Flucht

translation.en: from the stress of running this colony.
Yeah.
And, um…
I mean, you're probably the only person left alive from my old life.
translation.de: …du bist der Einzige von früher, der noch lebt.

translation.en: From Fairfield.
Oh. There's a… there's a "but" coming, isn't there?
But I didn't think you'd actually come here, Joel.
translation.de: Aber ich habe nicht wirklich mit dir gerechnet.

translation.en: And I am so happy to see you.
translation.de: Ich freue mich so, dich zu sehen.

translation.en: I'm just not--
I'm not the same person that I used to be, you know?
translation.de: Ich bin nicht mehr, wer ich war, weißt du?

translation.en: Seven years, that's a long time.
translation.de: Sieben Jahre, das ist eine lange Zeit.

translation.en: I've-- I've lost people. My mom, my friends, and--
translation.de: Ich habe Leute verloren. Meine Mutter, meine Freunde.

translation.en: Last year I lost someone…
and he meant a lot to me.
translation.de: Und er hat mir viel bedeutet.

translation.en: Oh, man, I feel like such an idiot.
translation.de: Oh Mann, ich fühle mich wie ein Idiot.

translation.en: -No. No, don't. -I didn't even--
I didn't even ask you if I should come.
I just got so excited, and I-- I left.
translation.de: Ich war so aufgeregt und zog los.

translation.en: I don't know what I thought.
translation.de: Ich weiß nicht, was ich dachte.

translation.en: Well, I know what I thought.
I'd come and… and sweep you off your feet,
translation.de: Ich dachte, ich erobere dich im Sturm,

translation.en: and we'd be happy.
Oh, Joel.
But you… didn't w-want… me.
I am so sorry. I should have said something on the radio or--
translation.de: Es tut mir so leid. Ich hätte etwas über Funk sagen sollen, oder…

translation.en: No. It's okay. It's okay. Um…
I know this isn't how you pictured this going, but…
translation.de: Ich weiß, du hast dir das anders vorgestellt, aber…

translation.en: you'll still come with us, right?
Come with you-- Uh, on the… yacht?
This is our shot at survival.
translation.de: Das ist die Chance zu überleben.

translation.en: Give Cap a chance.
-[Cap muttering] -Tell us.
[Bill] Yeah, come on, Cap. Tell us another story.
translation.de: Komm, Cap. Erzähl noch eine Geschichte.

translation.en: -[Janice] Yeah, come on. -Four years post-Agatha.
HMS Brisbane. First watch.
I was the first person to see it coming over the wall.
translation.de: Ich sah ihn über die Mauer kommen.

translation.en: -Giant lizard, two stories high. -[all gasping]
I sounded the alarm.
Too late.
-We lost 1,032 souls that night. -[all gasping]
translation.de: Wir verloren in dieser Nacht 1032 Leute.

translation.en: Those of us that survived took to the sea.
I mean, make no mistake. We have lost this war. Right?
translation.de: Machen wir uns nichts vor, wir haben den Krieg verloren.

translation.en: There is no place for mankind on land. But out there?
translation.de: An Land ist für Menschen kein Platz. Aber auf See?

translation.en: There we got a chance.
[clears throat] I've got a--
Sorry. Just got a… question.
translation.de: Entschuldigung. Ich habe nur eine Frage.

translation.en: I survived seven days on the surface,
and… if I can do that, literally anyone can.
translation.de: und wenn ich das kann, kann es wirklich jeder.

translation.en: Seven days on the surface? I'm impressed.
translation.de: Sieben Tage an der Oberfläche? Ich bin beeindruckt.

translation.en: So maybe we still have a chance… to fight
translation.de: Vielleicht können wir also doch noch kämpfen

translation.en: and-- and, you know, win, uh… win our-- win our world back.
I have a plan. And if you have a better one, mate, I'm-- I'm all ears.
translation.de: Ich habe einen Plan. Wenn du einen besseren hast, bin ich ganz Ohr.

translation.en: -And I will stand by your side. -You wanna hear my--
translation.de: Und ich werde zu dir stehen. Du willst meinen Plan hören?

translation.en: -You wanna hear my plan? -[scattered] Yeah.
[Joel] It's, uh…
just, uh…
I got nothing, uh… [clears throat]
Hey, that's on me.
I-I didn't mean to put you on the spot, mate. It's--
translation.de: Ich habe dir die Pistole auf die Brust gedrückt.

translation.en: Well-- [chuckles] Aimee tells me you make a mean minestrone.
translation.de: Aimee sagt, du machst prima Minestrone.

translation.en: And you're great on the radio.
Lord knows I need a comms expert.
-Someone to teach Rocko how to cook. -[all laughing]
Do you guys have a radio I can use? I want to contact my colony.
translation.de: Habt ihr ein Funkgerät? Ich möchte meine Kolonie kontaktieren.

translation.en: 7045, this is 3022. Come in.
7045, this is 3022. Is anyone there?
Tim? Ava? Anyone. Over.
Cap thought you might need a snack.
translation.de: Cap dachte, du brauchst einen Snack.

translation.en: -Oh. -You know, he brews his own beer.
-Yep. Yeah, I heard. -It's good, man.
translation.de: -Ja, habe ich gehört. -Es ist gut, Mann.

translation.en: -Cool. Thank you. -Yeah.
[Ray] Hello? Is someone there?
Hey. Yeah! Yeah!
Yeah, Ray, is that you? It's me. It's Joel.
translation.de: Ray, bist du das? Hier ist Joel.

translation.en: Joel? [chuckling] Oh, my God!
-Hey, guys! It's Joel. He made it! -[all chattering on radio]
translation.de: Hey, Leute! Es ist Joel. Er hat es geschafft!

translation.en: -[Tim] You're kidding! -Hey. Hey, guys!
It's me. It's Joel. I'm-- I'm-- I'm safe.
translation.de: Ich bin's, Joel. Ich bin in Sicherheit.

translation.en: I-I made it. I'm at Aimee's colony.
-[Tim] He made it! -[Kala] My God, you're alive?
-It's so good to hear you guys' voices. -[Tim] Good to hear you, too, buddy.
translation.de: -Es tut gut, euch zu hören. -Wir freuen uns auch.

translation.en: -[Kala] Are you okay? -I feel like it's been so long.
-I got so much to tell you guys. -[Kala] Tell us what you've seen.
translation.de: -So viel zu erzählen. -Was hast du gesehen?

translation.en: -I saw a queen Sandgobbler. -[Tim] What's a queen Sandgobbler?
It's-- I don't know, but I blew it up. I blew it up with a hand grenade!
translation.de: Keine Ahnung, aber ich habe sie in die Luft gejagt.

translation.en: -Can you believe that? -[Ray] Where'd you get a grenade?
Yeah, it was so awesome, and--
translation.de: Ja, es war so toll, und…

translation.en: What else? What else? Uh, I met these two really cool survivors.
translation.de: Was noch? Ich traf zwei coole Überlebende.

translation.en: And they taught me all these things. They live on the surface and--
translation.de: Sie brachten mir viel bei. Sie leben an der Oberfläche und…

translation.en: And, oh, oh, oh! I met a Mav1s.
-I talked to a real-life Mav1s. -[Kala] No way! What's she like?
translation.de: -Eine echte Mav1s. -Gibt's ja nicht. Wie ist sie so?

translation.en: Uh, she was… very informative, emotionally, and…
translation.de: Sie war sehr informativ, emotional gesehen, und…

translation.en: And I got a dog too, um…
-[Ray] Wow, Joel. You got a dog? -[Kala] And how is it with Aimee?
translation.de: -Wow. Du hast einen Hund? -Und wie ist es mit Aimee?

translation.en: Uh, really…
really good.
[Kala] Joel, you simply surviving that journey, it's incredible.
translation.de: Joel, dass du diese Reise überlebt hast, ist unglaublich.

translation.en: [Ray] We're proud of you, Joel.
Man, I really miss you guys.
How is, uh-- How is everything back there? Give me the update.
translation.de: Wie läuft alles bei euch? Gebt mir ein Update.

translation.en: [Ray] Not good. We've had multiple breaches.
translation.de: Nicht gut. Es gab mehrere Eindringlinge.

translation.en: Multiple breaches? What do you mean? Is everyone okay?
translation.de: Was heißt mehrere? Geht es allen gut?

translation.en: Not really. I don't think we can stay here much longer.
translation.de: Nicht wirklich. Wir können wohl nicht bleiben.

translation.en: Uh, guys?
[Ray] We're surviving for now.
"Surviving for now." What? Sur-- Ray? Hey, guys!
translation.de: "Noch lebt ihr?" Was? Ray? Hey, Leute!

translation.en: -[static] -Hey, no, no, no, no, no, no, no. Shit.
translation.de: Hey, nein. Scheiße. Hallo, Leute, hört ihr mich?

translation.en: -Hello, guys, can you hear me? -[static crackling]
translation.de: Scheiße. Hallo, Leute, hört ihr mich?

translation.en: Guys?
I gotta go back.
What am I doing here?
Purple berries.
[Cap] Giant lizard, two stories high, coming over the wall.
translation.de: Riesige Echse, zwei Etagen hoch, über die Mauer.

translation.en: [Clyde] The lizard-looking ones can't climb for shit.
Lying son of a bitch.
Son of a bitch!
Y'all like this shit, huh?
-[both laughing] -Hey, hey. Aimee, Aimee, Aimee.
-Joel! -Hey, hey, hey, hey, hey. Hey.
-[whispering] I have to talk to you. -Joel!
Oh, you're so drunk.
Hot, super ripped, super awesome Joely-Joely Dawson!
translation.de: -Du bist so blau. -Der heiße, kernige, supertolle Joely-Joely Dawson!

translation.en: -[giggles] -Aimee, please.
translation.de: Aimee, bitte. Das ist sehr wichtig.

translation.en: This is super important. I need to talk to you about something.
translation.de: Aimee, bitte. Das ist sehr wichtig. Ich muss mit dir reden.

translation.en: You have to get everyone out of here right now.
Okay, I think something bad is about to happen. I'm telling you.
translation.de: Etwas Schlimmes wird passieren. Ich sage dir, ich spüre es. Eine schlechtes Gefühl.

translation.en: I can feel it. This is a bad-- This is a bad vibe.
translation.de: Ich sage dir, ich spüre es. Eine schlechtes Gefühl.

translation.en: I think he's planning something. I don't think he's here to save you.
translation.de: Er plant etwas. Er will euch nicht retten.

translation.en: -Who? -The yacht captain. He tried to poison me.
Cap. Cap's right there. He's dancing.
Oh, my-- I hate him. I hate him so much.
Listen, he gave me these poison berries, okay?
translation.de: Hör zu, er hat mir Giftbeeren gegeben.

translation.en: I know that the berries are poison because my dog told me.
translation.de: Sie sind giftig. Mein Hund sagt es.

translation.en: You have a talking dog?
-No, no, no, Aimee. -I love dogs!
[Aimee] What does he say? Where is the little fella?
translation.de: Was sagt er? Wo ist der Kleine?

translation.en: Please. Please try to listen to me.
I need your help. Something's gonna happen.
translation.de: Hilf mir. Etwas geht hier vor sich.

translation.en: Your colony, they're in danger.
-Joel. -What?
-Joel! -[grunts]
Oh, shit.
-Aimee? Aimee? -Joel? Joel, are you okay?
[Cap] Good morning.
Joel, I'm sorry about the fist to your face.
translation.de: Joel, tut mir leid wegen der Faust.

translation.en: I couldn't have you talking shit about us on the radio. I didn't wanna mess this up.
translation.de: Du durftest nicht am Funk reden.

translation.en: -[grunting] -Dana, take care of it.
translation.de: Ich wollte es nicht vermasseln. Dana, tu es.

translation.en: Dana, d-don't. Not the radio tower!
-[man] What are you doing? -[woman] Are you crazy?
So, you probably figured out we're not on a pleasure cruise.
translation.de: Ihr seht, wir sind kein Kreuzfahrtschiff.

translation.en: My crew and I want to thank you for your generous donations.
translation.de: Meine Crew und ich danken für eure Spenden.

translation.en: Food, water, supplies, medicine.
We greatly appreciate it.
It will see us through to the next helpless colony down the coast.
translation.de: Es reicht bis zur nächsten Kolonie an der Küste.

translation.en: [man] He's a food stealer!
-You're right. -[man] Yeah.
But it's not that simple. The world is basically devoid of fossil fuels.
translation.de: Aber nicht nur das. Es gibt praktisch keinen Treibstoff.

translation.en: Not enough to run a yacht on, anyway.
So my crew and I, we had to improvise just to survive.
translation.de: Meine Crew und ich mussten improvisieren, um zu überleben.

translation.en: And we found a real special fuel source. Actually, Rocko did.
-Didn't ya, big fella? -Yeah, that was me.
translation.de: -Rocko fand sie. Nicht wahr? -Ja, das war ich.

translation.en: Ten tons of pure power, chained to the front of that yacht.
translation.de: Zehn Tonnen reine Kraft, angekettet an die Vorderseite der Jacht.

translation.en: She's sleeping now.
She will be hungry soon.
What?
Well, what can I say?
Shit gets crazy in the apocalypse.
Oh, my God.
[woman] You can't do this!
-[Aimee] Oh, my God. -[all screaming]
Run!
-Rose! -[screaming continues]
-[growling] -Oh, my God, we're gonna die.
M'kay. Just gotta find a way to free my hands from the--
translation.de: Ich muss nur meine Hände freibekommen…

translation.en: I have to stop these bastards from taking our stuff!
translation.de: Die Bastarde dürfen unsere Sachen nicht nehmen.

translation.en: Oh, my-- [shouts]
You traveled 85 miles across hell. I think I can stop three assholes.
translation.de: Du hast 150 km geschafft. Dann schaffe ich drei Arschlöcher.

translation.en: -You get the crab! -What?
This is desperate.
-Aimee? -[roaring continues]
Holy shit. [gasps]
-Holy shit. -[roaring continues]
-[roaring continues] -No, no, no, no, no!
Boy? Boy!
-Boy! Hey! -[barking continues]
Dana? Shoot the dog.
[Joel] Aimee!
-[Aimee grunts] -[Joel] No!
Rocko? Time to go. Let's mo--
-Oh, no, you don't. -[switch clicks]
Boy! I need you to listen to me right now.
You see over there? Go get Aimee.
translation.de: Siehst du da drüben? Hol Aimee.

translation.en: Let's move it!
Go now. Now. Now!
I'm sorry I yelled at you!
Move.
Okay, crab, you want some of--
Okay! Whoa! Whoa!
Hey, hey, hey, hey! Listen. You don't wanna do this.
translation.de: Hey! Hör mal. Das solltest du lassen.

translation.en: -[Janice screaming] -Oh, no!
Aimee! Aimee, throw me the cannon! I know how to kill it!
translation.de: Wirf mir die Kanone zu! Ich weiß, wie man sie tötet!

translation.en: You can always tell in the eyes.
translation.de: Du siehst es immer in den Augen.

translation.en: -What are you doing? Shoot it! -Shoot it! What are you waiting for?
translation.de: -Was tust du? Schieß! -Schieß! Worauf wartest du?

translation.en: -[Janice] Kill it! -[Bill] Goddamn it, shoot it!
Needle through water.
-You're free. -[growling]
Oh, my God.
Oh, shit, we're gonna die. We're dying.
translation.de: Scheiße, wir werden sterben. Wir sterben.

translation.en: No! [screaming]
That was amazing.
What? Uh--
Amazing? Me?
-Yeah. -You thought I was…
-Thank you, Joel. -Yeah?
Yeah, well, I would've done it different, but… you did all right.
translation.de: Ich hätte es anders gemacht, aber es war in Ordnung.

translation.en: Oh. Okay.
Sorry. Yeah, just…
That's looking better. Take care of it.
-[Rose] Bye now. -Bye, guys.
-Can you move this? Yeah. -[Joel] Aimee.
-Hey. -Hey. Um…
I gotta get back to my colony, see if they're okay.
translation.de: Ich muss zurück in meine Kolonie und nach ihnen schauen.

translation.en: Right, yeah. Yeah.
Some friends of mine told me that there's a place in the mountains,
translation.de: Freunde erzählten mir von einem Ort in den Bergen,

translation.en: I guess, that's safe from the monsters.
So maybe we'll all head there.
Um, it was really cool to just-- to see you in action,
translation.de: Es war cool zu sehen, was du machst.

translation.en: and… I don't know, how you take care of all these people, and then…
translation.de: Und… wie du dich um die ganzen Leute kümmerst und…

translation.en: -Oh. -I'm so glad you came.
translation.de: Ich bin froh, dass du hier warst.

translation.en: I gotta go.
I'm worried about 'em.
translation.de: Ich mache mir Sorgen um sie.

translation.en: Yeah.
But I had something for you. Um…
translation.de: Aber ich hatte etwas für dich.

translation.en: [Aimee] Oh, my God.
Crocodile Carl?
-Oh, my God. -I know. [chuckles]
Thought you should have him back finally.
Here, uh…
-No, I can't take that. You need it. -No, no, no.
I want you to take it. It'd mean a lot to me.
translation.de: Nimm es. Es würde mir viel bedeuten.

translation.en: Really, take it. Um…
I got it all up here, anyway. So I can always make copies.
translation.de: Ich habe eh alles hier oben. Ich kann Kopien machen.

translation.en: Thanks for inspiring me to…
take this trip.
It's the best decision I ever made.
All right, uh, I'm gonna go.
translation.de: Alles klar, ich gehe dann mal.

translation.en: -Yeah. -Boy, come on!
-Uh, be careful. -Yeah, you, too.
-Bye, Aimee. -Bye.
That was…
-Great. -Yeah.
I'll come find you.
You better.
Okay.
[Joel] My name is Joel Dawson.
I'm 24 years old, and I survived seven days on the surface.
translation.de: Ich bin 24 Jahre alt und habe sieben Tage an der Oberfläche überlebt.

translation.en: Twice, actually.
-[chattering, gasping] -You guys! Hey!
-Oh, my God! -Hey, hey, hey!
I'm alive because of the generosity of a few strangers
translation.de: Ich lebe dank der Großzügigkeit einiger Fremder

translation.en: and the kindness of a great dog.
translation.de: und der Güte eines tollen Hundes.

translation.en: My colony and I are headed to the mountains.
translation.de: Jetzt gehen wir in die Berge,

translation.en: There's supposed to be less monsters there.
And don't get me wrong. The surface is a dangerous place.
translation.de: Versteht mich nicht falsch. Die Oberfläche ist gefährlich.

translation.en: But I don't think hiding underground is the answer anymore.
translation.de: Aber sich zu verstecken ist keine Lösung mehr.

translation.en: There is a great big, beautiful, inspiring world out there.
translation.de: Es gibt eine große, schöne, inspirierende Welt da draußen.

translation.en: [on radio] And I know you think it might be impossible, but it's not.
translation.de: Vielleicht haltet ihr es für unmöglich, aber ist es nicht.

translation.en: If I can survive out here, anybody can.
translation.de: Wenn ich hier überlebe, kann es jeder.

translation.en: It's like a good friend once told me.
Good instincts are earned by making mistakes.
translation.de: Gute Instinkte verdient man durch Fehler.

translation.en: If you're lucky enough to survive a few mistakes,
translation.de: Wenn ihr ein paar Fehler überlebt,

translation.en: you're gonna do all right out here.
In this recording, you'll find everything I know about our new world.
translation.de: In dieser Aufnahme steckt alles, was ich über unsere Welt weiß.

translation.en: Most of this I had to learn the hard way.
translation.de: Ich musste auf die harte Tour lernen.

translation.en: Hopefully, it'll make your way a little easier.
So, crank open that hatch.
Okay, come on.
[Joel] Breathe some fresh air. Go. Live your life.
translation.de: Atmet frische Luft. Geht. Lebt euer Leben.

translation.en: It won't be easy, but it'll be worth it.
translation.de: Es wird nicht leicht, aber es wird sich lohnen.

translation.en: I traveled 85 miles to find that what I'd been missing below ground for seven years
translation.de: Ich legte 150 km zurück, um zu verstehen, dass das, was ich vermisste,

translation.en: was right above my head this whole time.
translation.de: immer über meinem Kopf gewesen ist.

translation.en: And it's incredible.
Oh, and one last thing. Don't settle.
translation.de: Oh, und noch etwas. Keine Kompromisse.

translation.en: You don't have to. Not even at the end of the world.
translation.de: Habt ihr nicht nötig. Selbst beim Weltuntergang.

translation.en: Signing off,
[Minnow] "Don't settle"? That's my line.
It's a long journey, kid. I hope you know what you're doing.
translation.de: Eine lange Reise. Ich hoffe, du weißt, was du tust.

translation.en: [Minnow] He definitely doesn't. Snow Spiders will probably get him.
translation.de: Tut er nicht. Die Schneespinnen kriegen ihn sicher.

translation.en: -[Clyde] That's not a good way to go. -[Minnow] They will tear him apart.
-[Clyde] Nah, he'll figure it out. -[Minnow] Possibly.
